message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,500. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, $14,500 is already a competitive offer considering the true value and benefits this product brings.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to lower it to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $11,500. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
